questionTitle: The young soldier ________ a dangerous mission across the desert, although he knew that he might be killed.
What a lovely dress ________ on.
They have just released a new record called 'Starlight', ________ you must buy.
Because nobody admitted breaking the window, the ________ class was kept in after school.
It was a good attempt, but it didn't really come ________, which was a pity.
Your marks are poor, ________ I'm afraid you have failed.
Excuse me, but would you ________ talking a little bit more quietly? We are trying to work.
The banks seems to have credited my account with $100 in ________.
You think that's a good idea? I'm sorry, but I don't ________ you at all.
Although this wine is quite cheap, it is very ________.
Excuse me, do you ________ me bringing my dog into your house?
He has a very ________ temper and often says things he regrets later.
He says he's sorry ________ what he did, so you need not get angry with him.
I'm not satisfied ________ your work.
I cannot be held responsible ________ other people's mistakes.
I will ask him to give me my record back when I ________ him.
I'm afraid my speech may have ________ you as to my true aims.
What he told me was a ________ of lies.
The death penalty was ________ many years ago in this country.
Although the language was ________ and considered to be inferior to standard English, Robert Burns wrote his love poetry in the language of the Scots.
